00092 <table>

00100 <?php
00101 $rulenumber = '0';
00102 foreach ($_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules as $rule) {
00103     if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00104         print "<tr>\n\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";
00105         print "\t<td class=\"comment\" colspan=\"";
00106         print ('4'). "\">". nl2br(stripslashes($rule['comment'])). "</td>\n";
00107     } else {
00108         if ($rulenumber%2) {
00109             print "<tr class=\"even\">\n";
00110         } else {
00111             print "<tr>\n";
00112         }
00113         print "\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";
00114 
00115         print "\t<td>". htmlentities($rule['identifier']). "</td>\n";
00116 
00117         print "\t<td>";
00118         if ($rule['const']) {
00119             print "const<br />";
00120         }
00121         if ($rule['persist']) {
00122             print "persist";
00123         }
00124         print "</td>\n";
00125 
00126         print "\t<td>";
00127         if ($rule['data']) {
00128             $i = '0';
00129             foreach ($rule['data'] as $value) {
00130                 print "\n\t\t". $value. "<br />";
00131                 if (++$i > '10') {
00132                     break;
00133                 }
00134             }
00135             if ($i > '10') {
00136                 print "+". (count($rule['data']) - '11'). " more entries (not displayed)";
00137             }
00138         }
00139         if ($rule['file']) {
00140             if (!is_array($rule['file'])) {
00141                 print " file \"". $rule['file']. "\"";
00142             } else {
00143                 foreach ($rule['file'] as $file) {
00144                     print "\n\t\t file \"". $file. "\"<br />";
00145                 }
00146             }
00147         }
00148         print "\n\t</td>\n";
00149 
00150         print "\t<td class=\"rulecomment\">". stripslashes($rule['comment']). "</td>\n";
00151     }
00152     print "\t<td class=\"edit\">";
00153     if ($rule['type'] != 'comment') {
00154         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"tableedit.php?rulenumber=$rulenumber\">e</a> ";
00155     } else {
00156         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"commentedit.php?action=table&amp;rulenumber=$rulenumber\">e</a> ";
00157     }
00158     if ($rulenumber) {
00159         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?up=$rulenumber\">u</a> ";
00160     } else {
00161         print "\n\t\t u ";
00162     }
00163     if ($rulenumber != (count($_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules) - 1)) {
00164         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?down=$rulenumber\">d</a> ";
00165     } else {
00166         print "\n\t\t d ";
00167     }
00168     print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?del=$rulenumber\" title=\"Delete Rule\" onclick=\"return confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this Rule?')\">x</a> ";
00169     print "\n\t</td>\n";
00170 
00171     print "</tr>\n";
00172     $rulenumber++;
00173 }
00174 ?>
00175 </table>

00198     <?php

00202         $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->anchor->rules[$rulenumber];
00203         if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00204             print "<tr>\n\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";
00205             print "\t<td class=\"comment\" colspan=\"3\">". nl2br(stripslashes($rule['comment'])). "</td>\n";
00206         } else {
00207             if ($colorcount%2) {
00208                 print "<tr align=\"center\" class=\"even\">\n";
00209             } else {
00210                 print "<tr align=\"center\">\n";
00211             }
00212             print "\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";

00214             print "\t<td>". $rule['filename']. "</td>\n";
00215             print "\t<td class=\"rulecomment\">". stripslashes($rule['comment']). "</td>\n";

00217         }
00218         print "\t<td class=\"edit\">";
00219         if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00220           print "\n\t\t<a href=\"commentedit.php?action=anchor&amp;rulenumber=$rulenumber\">e</a> ";
00221         } else {
00222           print "\n\t\t<a href=\"anchorloadedit.php?rulenumber=$rulenumber\">e</a> ";
00223         }
00224         if ($rulenumber) {
00225             print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?aup=$rulenumber\">u</a> ";

00227             print "\n\t\t u ";
00228         }
00229         if ($rulenumber != (count($_SESSION['pfw']->anchor->rules) - '1')) {
